tool_description: Estimates forward-looking expected returns using historical data, factor models, or analyst forecasts with various methodologies.

market_return.description: Expected market return for factor models

shrinkage_intensity.description: Shrinkage toward prior for Bayesian methods

error_messages: Invalid estimation method: Use one of [historical, capm, fama_french, black_litterman, bayesian].
Invalid lookback period: Must be at least 30 days and not exceed available data.
Invalid factor model: Use one of [capm, fama_french_3, fama_french_5].
Invalid rate parameters: market_return and risk_free_rate must be positive numbers.
Insufficient historical data: Need adequate history for chosen estimation method.
Invalid shrinkage intensity: Must be between 0 and 1.
usage: Provide asset symbols and specify return estimation methodology and parameters. Returns expected return estimates with confidence intervals.

symbols_estimated.description: Assets for which returns were estimated

forecast_period.description: Time horizon for the return estimates

average_expected_return.description: Average expected return across all assets
